segments.text: How do you usually spend your time , now that you ’ Ve retired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I nearly always get up at dawn . I don ’ t like sleeping in late . The days are longer in summer than in winter , so I get up in summer . I usually do some exercise when I get up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you have for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually have cereal , but sometimes I cook a traditional English breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that sounds nice . How do you spend your mornings ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually do housework in mornings . I go shopping occasionally . I like to do all my shopping in one bag trip to the supermarket . I always drive to the big supermarket in the city center . It takes about 20 minutes to drive there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you spend your afternoons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually meet some friends and we play sports together or I might spend some time alone on my hobbies . I spend winter evening watching tv , but I spend summer evening at cultural events if I have time .
segments.speaker: S2
